name: weekly-retention-summary
prompt: Run `metabase query 7 "SELECT toStartOfWeek(time) as week, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) FROM events WHERE time >= today() - 30 GROUP BY week ORDER BY week"` and send a summary of weekly active user trends. Highlight any significant changes.

name: daily-error-digest
prompt: Check recent errors using `metabase query 3 "SELECT message, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM errors WHERE created_at >= today() - 1 GROUP BY message ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 10"` and summarize the top issues.

name: seo-weekly-report
prompt: Run `gsc top-queries -s https://example.com -l 20` and `gsc top-pages -s https://example.com -l 20` and provide a weekly SEO summary with notable changes.
